snippet.title: Adyashanti
snippet.description:
Adyashanti, whose name means “primordial peace," is a spiritual teacher who has been teaching for more 20 years. His teachings include  meetings, intensives, silent retreats, live online broadcasts, and online retreats. He has taught throughout the US and also in Canada, the UK, the Netherlands, Denmark, Switzerland, Germany, and Australia. He is the author of nine books including "The End of Your World," "True Meditation," "The Most Important Thing," "Falling Into Grace," and "The Way of Liberation."

Founded in 1996 in the San Francisco Bay area, Open Gate Sangha supports the teachings of Adyashanti by making them available to all who sincerely yearn for peace and freedom.

Adyashanti offers teachings that are free of any tradition or ideology. He says, “The Truth I point to is not confined within any religious point of view, belief system, or doctrine.” His teachings are an open invitation to stop, inquire, and recognize what is true and liberating at the core of all existence.
